name: Housekeep
description: After receiving a mysterious letter from your estranged uncle, it falls on you to look after his house while he’s on vacation. Tend to the house by completing various tasks, but watch out as the house will begin to get you. Slowly but surely your sanity will drain and weird things may just start to occur. You could have sworn the bathroom was here, and is that shadow moving towards you or is it just your imagination? Stave off insanity for as long as possible by sticking to your routine and keeping the house in check, last long enough and you just might discover a grave secret…
